column4: what's necessary for apache2 to run perl scripts in a directory?  So far I have made sure the file itself is +w, and made a Directory directive in apache2.conf with "Options ExecCGI" in it.  What else am I missing?  My browser loads it like a text file.
wtf.  why doesn't it show up in apt-cache search?
make sure you have main repo enabled and correct
